a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Kaya Identity: drivers of CO₂ emissions, World
Percentage change in the four parameters of the Kaya Identity, which determine total CO₂ emissions.
Source: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project; UN; BP; World Bank; Maddison Project Database
Note: GDP per capita is measured in 2011 international-$ (PPP). This adjusts for inflation and cross-country price differences.
